originalText.text: Frank and his team are the best. They are handling multiple clients at any time but you can't tell because it always feels like you are getting individual attention. I always tell my clients that they should choose an attorney that they feel comfortable picking up the phone and speaking to. 6 out of the past 8 sales transactions, my clients have chosen to work with Coffey Law Group.

text.text: Frank and his team are the best. They are handling multiple clients at any time but you can't tell because it always feels like you are getting individual attention. I always tell my clients that they should choose an attorney that they feel comfortable picking up the phone and speaking to. 6 out of the past 8 sales transactions, my clients have chosen to work with Coffey Law Group.

originalText.text: Frank goes above and beyond to get the job done in the best interest of the client.  His due diligence leaves no stone unturned!  I have a great appreciation for Frank, as he always answers all questions promptly!  Frank has worked with so many of my sellers and buyers over the years and they have always praised him for a job well done!

text.text: Frank goes above and beyond to get the job done in the best interest of the client.  His due diligence leaves no stone unturned!  I have a great appreciation for Frank, as he always answers all questions promptly!  Frank has worked with so many of my sellers and buyers over the years and they have always praised him for a job well done!

originalText.text: Great service for a fair fee!  Frank was an excellent advocate and worked hard to ensure a smooth closing of my real estate purchase. Highly recommend to anyone needing a real estate lawyer!

text.text: Great service for a fair fee!  Frank was an excellent advocate and worked hard to ensure a smooth closing of my real estate purchase. Highly recommend to anyone needing a real estate lawyer!

originalText.text: I've had two great experiences with this law firm, as both a homebuyer and seller. Frank is thorough, timely with his communications, and very reasonably priced. I hope to do business with him again.

text.text: I've had two great experiences with this law firm, as both a homebuyer and seller. Frank is thorough, timely with his communications, and very reasonably priced. I hope to do business with him again.

originalText.text: Working with Frank and Serge was absolutely fantastic! Not only were they incredibly knowledgeable and patient through the entire due diligence process, but they walked me through all my questions and concerns as a first-time homebuyer.

text.text: Working with Frank and Serge was absolutely fantastic! Not only were they incredibly knowledgeable and patient through the entire due diligence process, but they walked me through all my questions and concerns as a first-time homebuyer.
